messages.title: WE'RE WORKING FOR A FAIRER SCOTLAND.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Deliver a fair deal for families with Council Tax frozen until 2016, easing the pressure on family budgets.
Deliver faster and better treatment with a guarantee to protect the NHS budget.
Give young Scots a fair chance at a job with a record 25,000 apprenticeship places.
Work to make communities safer by keeping the 1,000 extra police on the beat.
Give young Scots a fair start in life with 60,000 fewer pupils taught in crumbling schools and university education kept free.
Make sure our future is greener as well as fairer, with 130,000 jobs in the green economy by 2020.

issues.education: Give young Scots a fair start in life with 60,000 fewer pupils taught in crumbling schools and university education kept free.
issues.environment: Make sure our future is greener as well as fairer, with 130,000 jobs in the green economy by 2020.
issues.health: Deliver faster and better treatment with a guarantee to protect the NHS budget.

images.caption: WE'RE WORKING FOR A FAIRER SCOTLAND.
